newsitem.title: USA: CIBCR U.S. leading inflation index 104.7 in May.
newsitem.headline: CIBCR U.S. leading inflation index 104.7 in May.

text.p: The Center for International Business Cycle Research (CIBCR) said its U.S. leading inflation index (LII) rose to 104.7 in May from a revised 104.0 in April.
The increase in the tentative estimates of LII is modest, and the index is still in the narrow range of 103.8 to 105.2, CIBCR said.
"This stability is reassuring and consistent with the small variation of consumer price inflation in the same period," it said.
